about_the_game:
“Spirit is the energy common to all forms of life, and it’s present throughout the universe. It is what fills the body at birth and leaves it upon death. It is the connection with Omnipresence that can lead to higher states of mind and affect the logical shape of reality.”

The Spirit Kit will allow you to strengthen your Collection with Spirit Cards (green). It includes:

  • 6 Spirit (green) Card Packs
  • 500 Organite
  • Unique Spirit Card Back



Each Spirit Card Pack includes 5 Cards of Spirit (green) with different Rarity (Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary), allowing you to start upgrading your Spirit Decks, including the Faction (dual-colored) Decks.

Keep in mind that for every 20 Card Packs you open in the game, you’ll receive a Legendary Card Pack for free. This type of pack guarantees a Legendary Card.



Organite (Crystals) may be spent in the game to buy items such as Leaders (750 Organite), Card Packs (200 Organite), Card Backs (750 Organite), and more!



Add the Unique Spirit Card Back to your collection, and showcase it while battling your enemies. After the end of the Early Access, this item will only be available by acquiring this kit.

This kit can only be purchased on Steam once per account. If you already had the Spirit Card Back in your Collection, you will get all the other items included in the kit, and a full reimbursement of the Card Back in gold.
